page.title: 06CADEBY TOURIST ATTRACTIONS
page.content: {CADEBY BRASS RUBBING CENTRE} The Brass Rubbing Centre is housed within the Church of All Saints and attracts as many as 8000 visitors per year. {THE CADEBY LIGHT RAILWAY The railway, a hobby of the present rector of All Saints the Rev. E. R. Boston, extends halfway around the rectory garden and comprises a narrow gauge track carrying the rectors steam train "Pixie". The railway is open to the public on the second Saturday of each month{ {THE CADEBY STEAM FESTIVAL} The Rev. Boston also organises the annual Cadeby Steam Festival, held in July in the fields adjacent to the village. Steam enthusiasts come from far afield to exhibit their machines together with the Rev. Boston's magnificent engine "Fiery Elias".
